column5: Can anyone recommend any books, videos or DVDs on how to catch lake Ontario salmon? I have some fellow OFC members booked on trip trades this weekend and would like to at least look like I know what I'm doing. Any tips on lures and tackle would be helpful too. Would worms and bobbers work? Where would be a good place to rent a boat? Do you need a license? Where should I fish? It looks like a kinda big lake out there! GSP thingies would be appreciated.  Any help is greatly appreciated and advice (no matter how bad) is welcome.  Thx in advance,  Slayer
sounds like you might want to take them Pike fishing instead...
Uh, by the way......     I was impressed. And expectations have been set.
Send me a pm I can help you out.

sounds or looks like someone is messing with your account.  If not, a match, a stick-o-dy-no-might (a la Jimmy Walker voice) throw it out and wait...  now if you don't have that then I guess you might be in a bit of trouble then...
I'd start with worms and bobbers.  I have a few barbie and spiderman rod and reel combos you can use if you need them!
Read the books or watch the DVDs by Dan Keating....Including Keating on Kings. Then book a charter - you will learn so much from these guys, so fast!  That is a great start.
If by "GSP thingies" you mean "GSP photos", here's a few for ya:         Hope that helps.
I can take him...depends where he wants to go, but I can take him there. I have a car.

Gotta git yerself a couple a dem salman lewers and a box a dem due werms.Ya gets dem due werms outa dat box, and den ya slip one a dem buggers on da lewer. Tye dat sukker onto a few feats of brayed line and through the whole whatcha callit into the dern watter. Salmans like dat lots. I"m an Ex spurt on the whole affair. Hope i was helpin y'out  P
Wait till he finds out you dont Musky fish Mike
Dont frete, just steer the boat and watch the ff.I think I can manage to drop the cannon ball in the water for ya, no strings attached
Simon, have you been into the sauce, LOL!!  Think a few of the guys on here missed the joke.
Salmon are a myth but i heard if you cut up trout and dip it in butter... Nevermind
All you need is some bananas!  (ps. pictures on your other post!)
